original: nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate kuto bhavānanumānādīnāmaprāmāṇyamavadhāritavāniti /

nahi dhūma jñānam iva eṣām indriya artha sannikarṣāt aprāmāṇya jñānam udetum arhati

api ca pratipannam pumāṃsam apahāya apratipanna saṃdigdhāḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ pratipādyante
na ca eṣām itthaṃbhāvaḥ bhavat pratyakṣa gocaraḥ

bhavatu anya arthaḥ parāmarśaḥ tathā api etasmāt āśrama antarāṇi pratīyamānāni ca na apākaraṇam arhanti
evam tāni apākriyeran yat yasmāt na pratīyeran
pratīyamānāni vā śrutyā bādhyeran
na tāvat na pratīyante
tathā hi trayaḥ dharma skandhāḥ iti skandha tri tvam pratijñātam

original: tatra skandhaśabdo yadyāśramaparo na syādapi tu samūhavacanastato dharmāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ prātisvikotpattīnāṃ kimapekṣya tritvasaṅkhyā suvyavasthāpyeta
analyzed: tatra skandha śabdaḥ yadi āśrama paraḥ na syāt api tu samūha vacanaḥ tatas dharmāṇām yajña ādīnām prātisvika utpattīnām kim apekṣya tritva saṅkhyā su vyavasthāpyeta
ekaika āśrama upasaṃgṛhītāḥ tu āśramāṇām tri tvāt śakyāḥ tri tve vyavasthāpayitum iti āśrama tri tva pratijñā upapattiḥ

original: tatra yajñādiliṅgo gṛhāśrama eko dharmaskandho brahmacārīti dvitīyastapa iti ca,
analyzed: tatra yajña ādi liṅgaḥ gṛhāśramaḥ ekaḥ dharma skandhaḥ brahmacārī iti dvitīyaḥ tapaḥ iti ca
tapaḥ pradhānāt tu vānaprastha āśramāt na anyaḥ
brahma saṃsthaḥ iti ca pāriśeṣyāt parivrāj iti vakṣyati

original: tasmādanyaparādapi parāmarśādaśramāntarāṇi pratīyamānāni devatādhikaraṇanyāyena na śakyante 'pākartum /
analyzed: tasmāt anya parāt api parāmarśāt aśrama antarāṇi pratīyamānāni devatā adhikaraṇa nyāyena na śakyante pākartum

original: naca pratyakṣaśrutivirodho vīrahā vetyādeḥ pratipannagārhasthyaṃ pramādādajñānādvāgnimudvāsayituṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca pratyakṣa śruti virodhaḥ vīra hā vā ityādeḥ pratipanna gārhasthyam pramādāt ajñānāt vā agnim udvāsayitum pravṛttam pratyupapatteḥ

original: evañca avirodhe siddhavatparāmarśādaśramāntarāṇāṃ śāstrāntarasiddhiṃ vā kalpayiṣyāmo
analyzed: evam ca avirodhe siddha vat parāmarśāt aśrama antarāṇām śāstra antara siddhim vā

original: yathopavītavidhipare vākye 'upavyayate devalakṣmameva tatkurute'ityatra nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ
analyzed: yathā upavīta vidhi pare vākye deva lakṣmam eva tat kurute iti atra nivītam manuṣyāṇām
prācīnāvītam pitṛṇām iti śāstra antara siddhayoḥ nivīta prācīnāvītayoḥ parāmarśaḥ iti

vidhiḥ vā dhāraṇa vat
yadi api brahma saṃstha tva stuti para tayā asya saṃdarbhasya ekavākya tā gamyate
saṃbhava antyām ca eka vākya tāyām vākya bhedaḥ nyāyyaḥ
tathā api āśrama antarāṇām pūrva siddheḥ abhāvāt parāmarśa anupapatteḥ

original: aparāmarśe ca stuterasaṃbhavena kiṃparatayā ekavākyatāstvitī tāṃ bhaṅktvā dhāraṇavadvaramapūrvatvādvidhirevāstu /
analyzed: a parāmarśe ca stuteḥ asaṃbhavena kiṃpara tayā ekavākyatā astu iti tām bhaṅktvā dhāraṇa vat varam apūrva tvāt vidhiḥ evā astu

original: yathā 'adhastātsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravedupari hi devebhyo dhārayati'ityatra satyāmapyadhodhāraṇenaikavākyatāpratītau vidhīyata evoparidhāraṇamapūrvatvāt
analyzed: yathā adhastāt samidham dhārayan anudravet upari hi devebhyaḥ dhārayati iti atra satyām api adhodhāraṇena eka vākya tā pratītau vidhīyate eva upari dhāraṇam apūrva tvāt
tathā uktam vidhiḥ tu dhāraṇe pūrva tvāt iti
tathā iha api āśrama antara parāmarśa śrutiḥ vidhar evā iti kalpyate
saṃprati parāmarśe pi itareṣām āśramāṇām brahma saṃstha tā saṃstava sāmarthyāt eva vidhātavyā
na khalu avidheyam saṃstūyate tad artha tvāt saṃstavasya iti āha yadā api iti
atra avāntaravicāram ārabhate sā ca kim caturṣu iti
vicāra prayojanam āha yadi ca iti
nanu anāśramī eva brahma saṃsthaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha anāśrayam itvā iti
tatra pūrvapakṣam āha tatra tapaḥ śabdena iti
ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ

original: yadi tāvadbrahmasaṃstha iti padaṃ pratyastamitāvayavārthaṃ parivrājake 'śvakarṇādipadavadrūḍhaṃ tadāśramaprāptimātreṇaivāmṛtībhāva iti na tadbhāvāyā  #
analyzed: yadi tāvat brahma saṃsthaḥ iti padam pratyastamita avayava artham parivrājake śvakarṇa ādi pada vat rūḍham tad āśrama prāpti mātreṇa eva amṛtībhāvaḥ iti na tad bhāvāyāḥ
brahma jñānam apekṣeta
tathā ca na anyaḥ panthāḥ vidyate yanāya iti virodhaḥ
na ca saṃbhati avayava arthe samudāya śakti kalpanā
tasmāt brahmaṇi saṃsthāsye iti
brahma saṃsthaḥ

original: evañca caturṣvāśrameṣu yasyaiva brahmaṇi niṣṭhatvamāśramiṇaḥ sa brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvametīti yuktam /
analyzed: evam ca caturṣu āśrameṣu yasya eva brahmaṇi niṣṭha tvam āśramiṇaḥ sa brahma saṃsthaḥ mṛta tvam eti iti yuktam

original: tatra tāvadbrahmacārigṛhasthau svaśabdābhihitau tapaḥpadena ca tapaḥpradhānatayā bhikṣuvānaprasthāvupasthāpitau /
analyzed: tatra tāvat brahmacāri gṛhasthau sva śabda abhihitau tapaḥ padena ca tapaḥ pradhāna tayā bhikṣu vānaprasthau upasthāpitau
bhikṣuḥ api hi samādhika śauca aṣṭa grāsī bhojana niyamāt bhavati vānaprastha vat tapaḥ pradhānaḥ
na ca gṛhastha ādeḥ karmiṇaḥ brahma niṣṭha tva asaṃbhavaḥ

original: yadi tāvatkarmayogaḥ karmitā sā bhikṣorapi kāyavāṅmanobhirasti /
analyzed: yadi tāvat karma yogaḥ karmi tā sā bhikṣoḥ api kāya vāc manobhiḥ asti

original: atha ye na brahmārpaṇena karma kurvanti kintu kāmārthitayā te karmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: atha ye na brahmārpaṇena karma kurvanti kintu kāma arthi tayā te karmiṇaḥ

original: tathā sati gṛhasthādayo 'pi brahmārpaṇena karma kurvāṇā na karmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: tathā sati gṛhastha ādayaḥ pi brahma arpaṇena karma kurvāṇāḥ na karmiṇaḥ

original: tasmādbrahmaṇi tātparyaṃ brahmaniṣṭhatā na tu karmatyāgaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt brahmaṇi tātparyam brahma niṣṭha tā na tu karma tyāgaḥ
pramāṇa virodhāt

original: tapasā ca dvayorāśramayorekīkaraṇena traya iti tritvamupapadyate /
analyzed: tapasā ca dvayoḥ āśramayoḥ ekīkaraṇena trayaḥ iti tri tvam upapadyate

original: evañca trayo 'pyāśramā abrahmasaṃsthāḥ santaḥ puṇyalokabhājo bhavanti yaḥ punareteṣu brahmasaṃsthaḥ so 'mṛtatvabhāgiti /
analyzed: evam ca trayaḥ pi āśramāḥ a brahma saṃsthāḥ santaḥ puṇya loka bhājaḥ bhavanti yaḥ punar eteṣu brahma saṃsthaḥ saḥ mṛta tva bhāj iti
na ca yeṣām puṇya loka bhāj tvam teṣām eva amṛta tvam iti virodhaḥ

original: yathā devadattayajñadattau mandaprajñāvabhūtāṃ saṃprati tayoryajñādattastu śāstrābhyāsātpaṭuprajño vartate iti tathehāpi ya evābrahmasaṃsthāḥ
analyzed: yathā devadatta yajñadattau manda prajñau abhūtām saṃprati tayoḥ yajñādattaḥ tu śāstra abhyāsāt paṭu prajñaḥ vartate iti tathā iha api ye eva a brahma saṃsthāḥ
puṇya loka bhājaḥ te eva brahma saṃsthāḥ amṛta tva bhājaḥ iti avasthā bhedāt avirodhaḥ

original: tathāca brahmasaṃstha iti yaugikaṃ padaṃ prakṛtaviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tathā ca brahma saṃsthaḥ iti yaugikam padam prakṛta viṣayam bhaviṣyati

original: yathā āgneyyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhata ityatra viniyuktāpi prakṛtaivāgneyī gṛhyate /
analyzed: yathā āgneyyā āgnīdhram upatiṣṭhate iti atra viniyuktā api prakṛtā eva āgneyī gṛhyate
na ca viniyukta viniyoga virodhaḥ

original: yadi hyatrāgnotyupadiśyeta tato yathā pratītā tathoddiśyeta /
analyzed: yadi hi atra agne iti upadiśyeta tatas yathā pratītā tathā uddiśyeta
viniyuktā ca pratītiḥ bhavet iti viniyukta viniyoga virodhaḥ

original: iha tu āgnīdhropasthāne sā vidheyatvena viniyujyate /
analyzed: iha tu āgnīdhra upasthāne sā vidheya tvena viniyujyate
na tu uddiśyate
vidheya tvena ca viniyoge āgneyī padārtha apekṣaṇāt prakṛta atikrame pramāṇa abhāvāt
tāvatā ca śāstra upapatteḥ na aprakṛtānām api grahaṇa saṃbhavaḥ
na ca yātayāma tayā na viniyogaḥ
vācastome sarveṣām eva mantrāṇām viniyogāt anyatra api aviniyoga prasaṅgāt

original: tathehāpi prakṛtā evāśramā buddhiviparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante nānuktaḥ parivrāḍeveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: tathā iha api prakṛtāḥ eva āśramāḥ buddhi viparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante na anuktaḥ parivrāj eva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
rāddhāntam upakramate itat ayuktam
nahi satyām gatau vānaprastha viśeṣaṇena iti
yathā upakrāntam tathā eva parisamāpanam ucitam

original: yatsaṃkhyākāśca ye prasiddhāste tatsaṃkhyākā eva kīrtyante iti cocitam /
analyzed: yad saṃkhyākāḥ ca ye prasiddhāḥ te tad saṃkhyākāḥ eva kīrtyante iti ca ucitam
na tu satyām gatau utsargasya apavādaḥ yujyate

original: aśādhāraṇenaikaikena lakṣaṇenaikeka āśramo vaktumupakrānta iti tathaiva samāpanamucitam /
analyzed: aśā dhāraṇena ekaikena lakṣaṇena ekekaḥ āśramaḥ vaktum upakrāntaḥ iti tathā eva samāpanam ucitam
na tu sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇābhyām upakrama samāptī śliṣyete

original: naca tapo nāma nāsādhāraṇaṃ vānaprasthānāmityata āha-tapaścāsādhāraṇa iti /
analyzed: na ca tapaḥ nāma na asādhāraṇam vānaprasthānām iti atas āha tapaḥ ca asādhāraṇaḥ iti

original: na khalu parākādibhiḥ kāyakleśapradhāno yathā vānaprasthastathā bhikṣuḥ satyapyaṣṭagrāsādiniyame /
analyzed: na khalu parāka ādibhiḥ kāya kleśa pradhānaḥ yathā vānaprasthaḥ tathā bhikṣuḥ sati api aṣṭa grāsa ādi niyame

original: naca śaucasantoṣaśamadamādayastapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānāṃ tapaḥprasiddherasiddheḥ /
analyzed: na ca śauca santoṣa śama dama ādayaḥ tapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānām tapaḥ prasiddheḥ asiddheḥ
atas eva vṛddhāḥ tapasaḥ bhedena śauca ādīn ācakṣate śauca santoṣa tapaḥ svādhyāya īśvara praṇidhānāni niyamāḥ iti
siddha saṃkhyā bhedeṣu ca saṃkhyā antara abhidhānam āśliṣṭam iti āha catuṣṭvena ca iti
api ca bheda vyapadeśaḥ

original: traya eta iti kiṃ bhikṣurapi parāmṛśyate kintvā bhikṣuvarjaṃ traya eva /
analyzed: trayaḥ ete iti kim bhikṣuḥ api parāmṛśyate kintu ā bhikṣu varjam trayaḥ eva

original: na tāvantraya iti bhikṣusaṃgrahe tadvarjanamete traya ityatra vartuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: na tāvantrayaḥ iti bhikṣu saṃgrahe tad varjanam ete trayaḥ iti atra vartum śakyam

original: eta iti prakṛtānāṃ sākalyena parāmarśādbhikṣusaṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇyalokatvamabrahmasaṃsthātvābhāvādbhikṣoḥ /
analyzed: ete iti prakṛtānām sākalyena parāmarśāt bhikṣu saṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇya loka tvam a brahma saṃsthā tva abhāvāt bhikṣoḥ

original: tena tasya brahmasaṃsthasya sadā puṇyalokatvamamṛtatvaṃ ceti virodhaḥ /
analyzed: tena tasya brahma saṃsthasya sadā puṇya loka tvam amṛta tvam ca iti virodhaḥ
triṣu ca brahma saṃstha pade yadā iti saṃbandhanīyam
bhikṣau ca sadā iti vaiṣamyam
tat idam uktam pṛthaktve ca iti
pūrvapakṣa ābhāsam smārayati katham punar brahma saṃstha śabdaḥ yogāt iti
tat nirākaroti atra ucyate iti
ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ

original: satyaṃ yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛtasaṃbhave na tadatipattyāprakṛte vartitumarhati /
analyzed: satyam yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛta saṃbhave na tad atipattyā aprakṛte vartitum arhati

original: asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūtpramādapāṭha ityaprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ,
analyzed: asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūt pramāda pāṭhaḥ iti aprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ
darśitaḥ ca atra asaṃbhave dhastāt iti

original: eṣa hi brahmasaṃsthatālakṣaṇo dharmo bhikṣorasādhāraṇa āśramāntarāṇi tatsaṃsthānyatatsaṃsthāni ca bhikṣustatsaṃstha ityeva /
analyzed: eṣa hi brahma saṃstha tā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ bhikṣoḥ asādhāraṇaḥ āśrama antarāṇi tad saṃsthāni a tad saṃsthāni ca bhikṣuḥ tad saṃsthaḥ iti eva

original: tatsaṃsthatā hi svābhāvaṃ vyavacchindantī virodhādyastatsaṃstha eva tatrāñjasī nānyatra /
analyzed: tad saṃstha tā hi svābhāvam vyavacchindantī virodhāt yaḥ tad saṃsthaḥ eva tatra añjasī na anyatra
śama dama ādiḥ tu tadīyaḥ iti
sva aṅgam avyavadhāyakam iti arthaḥ

original: brahmasaṃsthatvamasādhāraṇaṃ parivrājakadharmaṃ śrutirādarśayatītyāha-tathāca nyāsa iti brahmeti /
analyzed: brahma saṃstha tvam asādhāraṇam parivrājaka dharmam śrutiḥ ādarśayati iti āha tathā ca nyāsaḥ iti brahma iti

original: sarvasaṅgaparityāgo hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kuta ityata āha-brahmā hi paraḥ /
analyzed: sarva saṅga parityāgaḥ hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kutas iti atas āha brahmā hi paraḥ
atas paraḥ nyāsaḥ brahma iti

original: kimapekṣya paraḥ saṃnyāsa ityata āha-tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayaditi /
analyzed: kim apekṣya paraḥ saṃnyāsaḥ iti atas āha tāni vai etāni avarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāse eva atyarecayat iti
etat uktam bhavati brahma para tayā sarva īṣaṇā parityāga lakṣaṇaḥ nyāsaḥ brahma iti

original: tathā cedṛśaṃ nyāsalakṣaṇaṃ brahmasaṃsthatvaṃ bhikṣorevāsādhāraṇaṃ netareṣāmāśramiṇām /
analyzed: tathā ca īdṛśam nyāsa lakṣaṇam brahma saṃstha tvam bhikṣoḥ eva asādhāraṇam na itareṣām āśramiṇām

original: brahmajñānasya śabdajanitasya yaḥ paripākaḥ sākṣātkāro 'pavargasādhanaṃ tadaṅgatayā pārivrājyaṃ vihitam /
analyzed: brahma jñānasya śabda janitasya yaḥ paripākaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ upavarga sādhanam tad aṅga tayā pārivrājyam vihitam
na tu anadhikṛtam prati iti arthaḥ

original: stutimātram upādānād iti cen nāpūrvatvāt / BBs_3,4.21 /
analyzed: stuti mātram upādānāt iti ced na apūrva tvāt
yadi atra saṃnidhāne upāsanā vidhiḥ na asti tatas vidhi vyabhicārita tad vidhi saṃbandhena udgīthena upasthāpitaḥ

original: sa eṣa rasānāṃ rasatama ityādinā padasaṃdarbheṇaikavākyabhāvamupagataḥ stūyate /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa rasānām rasatamaḥ ityādinā pada saṃdarbheṇa eka vākya bhāvam upagataḥ stūyate
nahi samabhivyāhṛtaiḥ eva eka vākya tā bhavati iti kaścid niyama hetuḥ asti
anuṣaṅga atideśa labdhaiḥ api vidhi asamabhivyāhṛtaiḥ arthavādaiḥ ekavākya tā abhyupagamāt
yadi tu udgītham upāsīta sāma upāsīta ityādi vidhi samabhivyāhāraḥ śrutaḥ tathā api tasya eva
vidheḥ stutiḥ na tu upāsanā viṣaya samarpaṇa paraḥ om iti etat akṣaram udgītham iti anena eva upāsanā viṣaya samarpaṇāt iti
prāpte bhidhīyate enad tāvat dūra sthena karma vidhi vākyena eka vākya tā asaṃbhavaḥ
pratīta samabhivyāhṛtānām vidhinā eka vākya tayā stuti artha tvam arthavādānām rakta paṭa nyāyena bhavati
na tu stutyā vinā kācid anupapattiḥ vidheḥ
yathā āhuḥ asti tu tat iti atireke parihāraḥ iti
atas eva vidheḥ apekṣā bhāvāt pravartana ātmakasya anuṣaṅga atideśa ādibhiḥ arthavāda prāpti abh idhānam asamañjasam
nahi kartṛ apekṣita upāyām avagatāyām prāśastya pratyayasya asti kaścid upayogaḥ
tasmāt dūra sthasya karma vidheḥ stutau ānarthakyam

original: tenaikavākyatānupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tūpāsanāvidheḥ kiṃ viṣayasamarpaṇenopayujyatāmuta stutyeti viśaye viṣayasamarpaṇena yathārthavattvaṃ  #
analyzed: tena eka vākya tā anupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tu upāsanā vidheḥ kim viṣaya samarpaṇena upayujyatām uta stutyā iti viśaye viṣaya samarpaṇena yathā arthavat tvam
na evam stutyāḥ bahis aṅga tvāt
agatyā hi sā
tasmāt upāsana arthāḥ iti siddham
kuryāt kriyeta kartavyam bhavet syāt iti pañcamam
etat syāt sarva vedeṣu niyatam vidhi lakṣaṇam
bhāvanāyāḥ khalu kartṛ samīhita anukūla tvam vidhiḥ niṣedhaḥ ca kartuḥ ahita anukūla tvam
yathā āhuḥ kartavyaḥ ca kartavyaḥ duḥkha phalaḥ iti
etat ca asmābhiḥ upapāditam nyāyakaṇikāyām
kriyā ca bhāvanā tad vacanāḥ ca karoti ādayaḥ
yathā āhuḥ kṛ bhvastayaḥ kriyā sāmānya vacanāḥ iti
atas eva kṛ bhvastīn udāhṛtavān

original: sāmānyoktau tadviśeṣāḥ pacedityādayo 'pi gamyanta iti tatra kuryādityākṣiptakartṛkā bhāvanā /
analyzed: sāmānya uktau tad viśeṣāḥ pacet ityādayaḥ pi gamyante iti tatra kuryāt iti ākṣipta kartṛkā bhāvanā
kriyeta iti ākṣipta karmikā bhāvanā
